Mendokusai

Tartarus

Twitter

17 Jan 2018

Yesterday I finally made use of the muted words feature on Twitter, and now any tweets containing the words "Trump", "crypto" or "Bitcoin" will no longer appear on my feed. It has only been one day, but my user experience has already increased tenfold...
